Documentation.content: A record containing information about filename. Includes name, size and when last modified. export FsFilenameRecord := RECORD string name; integer8 size; string19 modified; END;
Documentation.firstline: A record containing information about filename

Documentation.content: An alias for a logical filename that is stored in a row.
Documentation.firstline: An alias for a logical filename that is stored in a row

Documentation.content: A record containing a logical filename. It contains the following fields:

field.name: name
field.desc: The logical name of the file;

Documentation.firstline: A record containing a logical filename

Documentation.modified: Timestamp when the file was last modified;
Documentation.owner: The username of the owner who ran the job to create this file.
Documentation.inherits: Contains all the fields in FsLogicalFileNameRecord)
Documentation.firstline: A record containing information about a logical file
Documentation.content: A record containing information about a logical file.

field.name: size
field.desc: Number of bytes in the file (before compression)

field.name: rowcount
field.desc: Number of rows in the file.

Documentation.cluster: The cluster that this file was created on.

Documentation.content: A record containing information about a superfile and its contents.
Documentation.firstline: A record containing information about a superfile and its contents

Documentation.content: A record containing information about the relationship between two files.

field.name: primaryfile
field.desc: The logical filename of the primary file

field.name: secondaryfile
field.desc: The logical filename of the secondary file.

field.name: primaryflds
field.desc: The name of the primary key field for the primary file. The value "__fileposition__" indicates the secondary is an INDEX that must use FETCH to access non-keyed fields.

field.name: secondaryflds
field.desc: The name of the foreign key field relating to the primary file.

field.name: kind
field.desc: The type of relationship between the primary and secondary files. Containing either 'link' or 'view'.

field.name: cardinality
field.desc: The cardinality of the relationship. The format is <primary>:<secondary>. Valid values are "1" or "M".</secondary></primary>

field.name: payload
field.desc: Indicates whether the primary or secondary are payload INDEXes.

Documentation.firstline: A record containing information about the relationship between two files

param.desc: The IP address of the remote machine.

param.desc: The path to the directory to read. This must be in the appropriate format for the operating system running on the remote machine.

param.name: mask
param.desc: The filemask specifying which files to include in the result. Defaults to '*' (all files).

param.name: recurse
param.desc: Whether to include files from subdirectories under the directory. Defaults to FALSE.

param.name: namepattern
param.desc: The mask of the files to list. Defaults to '*' (all files).

param.name: includenormal
param.desc: Whether to include 'normal' files. Defaults to TRUE.

param.name: includesuper
param.desc: Whether to include SuperFiles. Defaults to FALSE.

param.name: unknownszero
param.desc: Whether to set file sizes that are unknown to zero(0) instead of minus-one (-1). Defaults to FALSE.

param.name: foreigndali
param.desc: The IP address of the foreign dali used to resolve the file. If blank then the file is resolved locally. Defaults to blank.

Documentation.content: Returns a dataset of information about the logical files known to the system.
Documentation.firstline: Returns a dataset of information about the logical files known to the system

Definition.name: CompareFiles

param.name: file1
param.desc: The logical name of the first file.

param.name: file2
param.desc: The logical name of the second file.

param.name: logical_only
param.desc: Whether to only compare logical information in the system datastore (Dali), and ignore physical information on disk. [Default TRUE]

param.name: use_crcs
param.desc: Whether to compare physical CRCs of all the parts on disk. This may be slow on large files. Defaults to FALSE.

Documentation.content: Compares two files, and returns a result indicating how well they match.
Documentation.firstline: Compares two files, and returns a result indicating how well they match
Documentation.return: 0 if file1 and file2 match exactly 1 if file1 and file2 contents match, but file1 is newer than file2 -1 if file1 and file2 contents match, but file2 is newer than file1 2 if file1 and file2 contents do not match and file1 is newer than file2 -2 if file1 and file2 contents do not match and file2 is newer than file1

Signature.sign: INTEGER4 CompareFiles(varstring lfn1, varstring lfn2, boolean logical_only=TRUE, boolean use_crcs=FALSE)
Signature.name: CompareFiles

Definition.Signature: INTEGER4 CompareFiles(varstring lfn1, varstring lfn2, boolean logical_only=TRUE, boolean use_crcs=FALSE)

param.name: lfn
param.desc: The name of the file to check.

param.name: use_crcs
param.desc: Whether to compare physical CRCs of all the parts on disk. This may be slow on large files.

Documentation.content: Checks the system datastore (Dali) information for the file against the physical parts on disk.
Documentation.firstline: Checks the system datastore (Dali) information for the file against the physical parts on disk
Documentation.return: 'OK' - The file parts match the datastore information 'Could not find file: <filename>' - The logical filename was not found 'Could not find part file: <partname>' - The partname was not found 'Modified time differs for: <partname>' - The partname has a different timestamp 'File size differs for: <partname>' - The partname has a file size 'File CRC differs for: <partname>' - The partname has a different CRC</partname></partname></partname></partname></filename>

Signature.sign: varstring VerifyFile(varstring lfn, boolean usecrcs)
Signature.name: VerifyFile

Definition.name: AddFileRelationship

param.name: primary
param.desc: The logical filename of the primary file.

param.name: secondary
param.desc: The logical filename of the secondary file.

param.name: primaryfields
param.desc: The name of the primary key field for the primary file. The value "__fileposition__" indicates the secondary is an INDEX that must use FETCH to access non-keyed fields.

param.name: secondaryfields
param.desc: The name of the foreign key field relating to the primary file.

param.name: relationship
param.desc: The type of relationship between the primary and secondary files. Containing either 'link' or 'view'. Default is "link".

param.name: cardinality
param.desc: The cardinality of the relationship. The format is <primary>:<secondary>. Valid values are "1" or "M".</secondary></primary>

param.name: payload
param.desc: Indicates whether the primary or secondary are payload INDEXes.

param.name: description
param.desc: The description of the relationship.

Documentation.content: Defines the relationship between two files. These may be DATASETs or INDEXes. Each record in the primary file should be uniquely defined by the primaryfields (ideally), preferably efficiently. This information is used by the roxie browser to link files together.
Documentation.firstline: Defines the relationship between two files

Signature.sign: AddFileRelationship(varstring primary, varstring secondary, varstring primaryflds, varstring secondaryflds, varstring kind='link', varstring cardinality, boolean payload, varstring description='')
Signature.name: AddFileRelationship

Definition.Signature: AddFileRelationship(varstring primary, varstring secondary, varstring primaryflds, varstring secondaryflds, varstring kind='link', varstring cardinality, boolean payload, varstring description='')

Documentation.content: The DfuPlusExec action executes the specified command line just as the DfuPLus.exe program would do. This allows you to have all the functionality of the DfuPLus.exe program available within your ECL code. param cmdline The DFUPlus.exe command line to execute. The valid arguments are documented in the Client Tools manual, in the section describing the DfuPlus.exe program.
Documentation.firstline: The DfuPlusExec action executes the specified command line just as the DfuPLus.exe program would do

Signature.sign: DfuPlusExec(varstring cmdline)

Definition.name: fSprayFixed

param.name: sourceIP
param.desc: The IP address of the file.

param.name: sourcePath
param.desc: The path and name of the file.

param.name: recordsize
param.desc: The size (in bytes) of the records in the file.

param.name: destinationGroup
param.desc: The name of the group to distribute the file across.

param.name: destinationLogicalName
param.desc: The logical name of the file to create.

param.name: timeOut
param.desc: The time in ms to wait for the operation to complete. A value of 0 causes the call to return immediately. Defaults to no timeout (-1).

param.name: espServerIpPort
param.desc: The url of the ESP file copying service. Defaults to the value of ws_fs_server in the environment.

param.name: maxConnections
param.desc: The maximum number of target nodes to write to concurrently. Defaults to 1.

param.name: allowOverwrite
param.desc: Is it valid to overwrite an existing file of the same name? Defaults to FALSE

param.name: replicate
param.desc: Whether to replicate the new file. Defaults to FALSE.

param.name: compress
param.desc: Whether to compress the new file. Defaults to FALSE.

param.name: failIfNoSourceFile
param.desc: If TRUE it causes a missing source file to trigger a failure. Defaults to FALSE.

param.name: expireDays
param.desc: Number of days to auto-remove file. Default is -1, not expire.

Documentation.content: Sprays a file of fixed length records from a single machine and distributes it across the nodes of the destination group.
Documentation.firstline: Sprays a file of fixed length records from a single machine and distributes it across the nodes of the destination group
Documentation.return: The DFU workunit id for the job.

Signature.sign: varstring fSprayFixed(varstring sourceIP, varstring sourcePath, integer4 recordSize, varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'), integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE, boolean failIfNoSourceFile=FALSE, integer4 expireDays=-1)
Signature.name: fSprayFixed

Definition.Signature: varstring fSprayFixed(varstring sourceIP, varstring sourcePath, integer4 recordSize, varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'), integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE, boolean failIfNoSourceFile=FALSE, integer4 expireDays=-1)

Definition.name: SprayFixed

Documentation.content: Same as fSprayFixed, but does not return the DFU Workunit ID.
Documentation.firstline: Same as fSprayFixed, but does not return the DFU Workunit ID

Signature.sign: SprayFixed(varstring sourceIP, varstring sourcePath, integer4 recordSize, varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'), integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE, boolean failIfNoSourceFile=FALSE, integer4 expireDays=-1)
Signature.name: SprayFixed

Definition.Signature: SprayFixed(varstring sourceIP, varstring sourcePath, integer4 recordSize, varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'), integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE, boolean failIfNoSourceFile=FALSE, integer4 expireDays=-1)

Definition.name: fSprayVariable

Signature.sign: varstring fSprayVariable(varstring sourceIP, varstring sourcePath, integer4 sourceMaxRecordSize=8192, varstring sourceCsvSeparate='\\,', varstring sourceCsvTerminate='\\n,\\r\\n', varstring sourceCsvQuote='\"', varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'), integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE, varstring sourceCsvEscape='', boolean failIfNoSourceFile=FALSE, boolean recordStructurePresent=FALSE, boolean quotedTerminator=TRUE, varstring encoding='ascii', integer4 expireDays=-1)
Signature.name: fSprayVariable

Definition.Signature: varstring fSprayVariable(varstring sourceIP, varstring sourcePath, integer4 sourceMaxRecordSize=8192, varstring sourceCsvSeparate='\\,', varstring sourceCsvTerminate='\\n,\\r\\n', varstring sourceCsvQuote='\"', varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'), integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE, varstring sourceCsvEscape='', boolean failIfNoSourceFile=FALSE, boolean recordStructurePresent=FALSE, boolean quotedTerminator=TRUE, varstring encoding='ascii', integer4 expireDays=-1)

Definition.name: SprayVariable

Signature.sign: SprayVariable(varstring sourceIP, varstring sourcePath, integer4 sourceMaxRecordSize=8192, varstring sourceCsvSeparate='\\,', varstring sourceCsvTerminate='\\n,\\r\\n', varstring sourceCsvQuote='\"', varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'), integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE, varstring sourceCsvEscape='', boolean failIfNoSourceFile=FALSE, boolean recordStructurePresent=FALSE, boolean quotedTerminator=TRUE, varstring encoding='ascii', integer4 expireDays=-1)
Signature.name: SprayVariable

Definition.Signature: SprayVariable(varstring sourceIP, varstring sourcePath, integer4 sourceMaxRecordSize=8192, varstring sourceCsvSeparate='\\,', varstring sourceCsvTerminate='\\n,\\r\\n', varstring sourceCsvQuote='\"', varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'), integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE, varstring sourceCsvEscape='', boolean failIfNoSourceFile=FALSE, boolean recordStructurePresent=FALSE, boolean quotedTerminator=TRUE, varstring encoding='ascii', integer4 expireDays=-1)

Definition.name: fSprayDelimited

param.name: sourceIP
param.desc: The IP address of the file.

param.name: sourcePath
param.desc: The path and name of the file.

param.name: sourceCsvSeparate
param.desc: The character sequence which separates fields in the file.

param.name: sourceCsvTerminate
param.desc: The character sequence which separates records in the file.

param.name: sourceCsvQuote
param.desc: A string which can be used to delimit fields in the file.

param.name: sourceMaxRecordSize
param.desc: The maximum size (in bytes) of the records in the file.

param.name: destinationGroup
param.desc: The name of the group to distribute the file across.

param.name: destinationLogicalName
param.desc: The logical name of the file to create.

param.name: timeOut
param.desc: The time in ms to wait for the operation to complete. A value of 0 causes the call to return immediately. Defaults to no timeout (-1).

param.name: espServerIpPort
param.desc: The url of the ESP file copying service. Defaults to the value of ws_fs_server in the environment.

param.name: maxConnections
param.desc: The maximum number of target nodes to write to concurrently. Defaults to 1.

param.name: allowOverwrite
param.desc: Is it valid to overwrite an existing file of the same name? Defaults to FALSE

param.name: replicate
param.desc: Whether to replicate the new file. Defaults to FALSE.

param.name: compress
param.desc: Whether to compress the new file. Defaults to FALSE.

param.name: sourceCsvEscape
param.desc: A character that is used to escape quote characters. Defaults to none.

param.name: failIfNoSourceFile
param.desc: If TRUE it causes a missing source file to trigger a failure. Defaults to FALSE.

param.name: recordStructurePresent
param.desc: If TRUE derives the record structure from the header of the file.

param.name: quotedTerminator
param.desc: Can the terminator character be included in a quoted field. Defaults to TRUE. If FALSE it allows quicker partitioning of the file (avoiding a complete file scan).

param.name: expireDays
param.desc: Number of days to auto-remove file. Default is -1, not expire.

Documentation.content: Sprays a file of fixed delimited records from a single machine and distributes it across the nodes of the destination group.
Documentation.firstline: Sprays a file of fixed delimited records from a single machine and distributes it across the nodes of the destination group
Documentation.return: The DFU workunit id for the job.

Definition.name: fSprayXml

param.name: sourceIP
param.desc: The IP address of the file.

param.name: sourcePath
param.desc: The path and name of the file.

param.name: sourceMaxRecordSize
param.desc: The maximum size (in bytes) of the records in the file.

param.name: sourceRowTag
param.desc: The xml tag that is used to delimit records in the source file. (This tag cannot recursivly nest.)

param.name: sourceEncoding
param.desc: The unicode encoding of the file. (utf8,utf8n,utf16be,utf16le,utf32be,utf32le)

param.name: destinationGroup
param.desc: The name of the group to distribute the file across.

param.name: destinationLogicalName
param.desc: The logical name of the file to create.

param.name: timeOut
param.desc: The time in ms to wait for the operation to complete. A value of 0 causes the call to return immediately. Defaults to no timeout (-1).

param.name: espServerIpPort
param.desc: The url of the ESP file copying service. Defaults to the value of ws_fs_server in the environment.

param.name: maxConnections
param.desc: The maximum number of target nodes to write to concurrently. Defaults to 1.

param.name: allowOverwrite
param.desc: Is it valid to overwrite an existing file of the same name? Defaults to FALSE

param.name: replicate
param.desc: Whether to replicate the new file. Defaults to FALSE.

param.name: compress
param.desc: Whether to compress the new file. Defaults to FALSE.

param.name: failIfNoSourceFile
param.desc: If TRUE it causes a missing source file to trigger a failure. Defaults to FALSE.

param.name: expireDays
param.desc: Number of days to auto-remove file. Default is -1, not expire.

Documentation.content: Sprays an xml file from a single machine and distributes it across the nodes of the destination group.
Documentation.firstline: Sprays an xml file from a single machine and distributes it across the nodes of the destination group
Documentation.return: The DFU workunit id for the job.

Signature.sign: varstring fSprayXml(varstring sourceIP, varstring sourcePath, integer4 sourceMaxRecordSize=8192, varstring sourceRowTag, varstring sourceEncoding='utf8', varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'), integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE, boolean failIfNoSourceFile=FALSE, integer4 expireDays=-1)
Signature.name: fSprayXml

Definition.Signature: varstring fSprayXml(varstring sourceIP, varstring sourcePath, integer4 sourceMaxRecordSize=8192, varstring sourceRowTag, varstring sourceEncoding='utf8', varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'), integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE, boolean failIfNoSourceFile=FALSE, integer4 expireDays=-1)

Definition.name: SprayXml

Documentation.content: Same as fSprayXml, but does not return the DFU Workunit ID.
Documentation.firstline: Same as fSprayXml, but does not return the DFU Workunit ID

Signature.sign: SprayXml(varstring sourceIP, varstring sourcePath, integer4 sourceMaxRecordSize=8192, varstring sourceRowTag, varstring sourceEncoding='utf8', varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'), integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE, boolean failIfNoSourceFile=FALSE, integer4 expireDays=-1)

Definition.name: fDespray

param.name: logicalName
param.desc: The name of the file to despray.

param.name: destinationIP
param.desc: The IP of the target machine.

param.name: destinationPath
param.desc: The path of the file to create on the destination machine.

param.name: timeOut
param.desc: The time in ms to wait for the operation to complete. A value of 0 causes the call to return immediately. Defaults to no timeout (-1).

param.name: espServerIpPort
param.desc: The url of the ESP file copying service. Defaults to the value of ws_fs_server in the environment.

param.name: maxConnections
param.desc: The maximum number of target nodes to write to concurrently. Defaults to 1.

param.name: allowOverwrite
param.desc: Is it valid to overwrite an existing file of the same name? Defaults to FALSE

Documentation.content: Copies a distributed file from multiple machines, and desprays it to a single file on a single machine.
Documentation.firstline: Copies a distributed file from multiple machines, and desprays it to a single file on a single machine
Documentation.return: The DFU workunit id for the job.

Signature.sign: varstring fDespray(varstring logicalName, varstring destinationIP, varstring destinationPath, integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'), integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE)
Signature.name: fDespray

Definition.Signature: varstring fDespray(varstring logicalName, varstring destinationIP, varstring destinationPath, integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'), integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE)

Documentation.content: Same as fDespray, but does not return the DFU Workunit ID.
Documentation.firstline: Same as fDespray, but does not return the DFU Workunit ID

Definition.name: fCopy

param.name: sourceLogicalName
param.desc: The name of the file to despray.

param.name: destinationGroup
param.desc: The name of the group to distribute the file across.

param.name: destinationLogicalName
param.desc: The logical name of the file to create.

param.name: sourceDali
param.desc: The dali that contains the source file (blank implies same dali). Defaults to same dali.

param.name: timeOut
param.desc: The time in ms to wait for the operation to complete. A value of 0 causes the call to return immediately. Defaults to no timeout (-1).

param.name: espServerIpPort
param.desc: The url of the ESP file copying service. Defaults to the value of ws_fs_server in the environment.

param.name: maxConnections
param.desc: The maximum number of target nodes to write to concurrently. Defaults to 1.

param.name: allowOverwrite
param.desc: Is it valid to overwrite an existing file of the same name? Defaults to FALSE

param.name: replicate
param.desc: Should the copied file also be replicated on the destination? Defaults to FALSE

param.name: asSuperfile
param.desc: Should the file be copied as a superfile? If TRUE and source is a superfile, then the operation creates a superfile on the target, creating sub-files as needed and only overwriting existing sub-files whose content has changed. If FALSE, a single file is created. Defaults to FALSE.

param.name: compress
param.desc: Whether to compress the new file. Defaults to FALSE.

param.name: forcePush
param.desc: Should the copy process be executed on the source nodes (push) or on the destination nodes (pull)? Default is to pull.

param.name: transferBufferSize
param.desc: Overrides the size (in bytes) of the internal buffer used to copy the file. Default is 64k.

Documentation.content: Copies a distributed file to another distributed file.
Documentation.firstline: Copies a distributed file to another distributed file
Documentation.return: The DFU workunit id for the job.

Signature.sign: varstring fCopy(varstring sourceLogicalName, varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, varstring sourceDali='', integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'), integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean asSuperfile=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE, boolean forcePush=FALSE, integer4 transferBufferSize=0, boolean preserveCompression=TRUE)
Signature.name: fCopy

Definition.Signature: varstring fCopy(varstring sourceLogicalName, varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, varstring sourceDali='', integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'), integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean asSuperfile=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE, boolean forcePush=FALSE, integer4 transferBufferSize=0, boolean preserveCompression=TRUE)

Definition.name: Copy

Documentation.content: Same as fCopy, but does not return the DFU Workunit ID.
Documentation.firstline: Same as fCopy, but does not return the DFU Workunit ID

Signature.sign: Copy(varstring sourceLogicalName, varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, varstring sourceDali='', integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'), integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean asSuperfile=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE, boolean forcePush=FALSE, integer4 transferBufferSize=0, boolean preserveCompression=TRUE)
Signature.name: Copy

Definition.Signature: Copy(varstring sourceLogicalName, varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, varstring sourceDali='', integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'), integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean asSuperfile=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE, boolean forcePush=FALSE, integer4 transferBufferSize=0, boolean preserveCompression=TRUE)

Definition.name: fReplicate

param.name: logicalName
param.desc: The name of the file to replicate.

param.name: timeOut
param.desc: The time in ms to wait for the operation to complete. A value of 0 causes the call to return immediately. Defaults to no timeout (-1).

param.name: espServerIpPort
param.desc: The url of the ESP file copying service. Defaults to the value of ws_fs_server in the environment.

Documentation.content: Ensures the specified file is replicated to its mirror copies.
Documentation.firstline: Ensures the specified file is replicated to its mirror copies
Documentation.return: The DFU workunit id for the job.

Signature.sign: varstring fReplicate(varstring logicalName, integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'))
Signature.name: fReplicate

Definition.Signature: varstring fReplicate(varstring logicalName, integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'))

Definition.name: Replicate

Documentation.content: Same as fReplicated, but does not return the DFU Workunit ID.
Documentation.firstline: Same as fReplicated, but does not return the DFU Workunit ID

Signature.sign: Replicate(varstring logicalName, integer4 timeOut=-1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'))

Definition.name: fRemotePull

param.name: remoteEspFsURL
param.desc: The url of the remote ESP file copying service.

param.name: sourceLogicalName
param.desc: The name of the file to despray.

param.name: destinationGroup
param.desc: The name of the group to distribute the file across.

param.name: destinationLogicalName
param.desc: The logical name of the file to create.

param.name: timeOut
param.desc: The time in ms to wait for the operation to complete. A value of 0 causes the call to return immediately. Defaults to no timeout (-1).

param.name: maxConnections
param.desc: The maximum number of target nodes to write to concurrently. Defaults to 1.

param.name: allowOverwrite
param.desc: Is it valid to overwrite an existing file of the same name? Defaults to FALSE

param.name: replicate
param.desc: Should the copied file also be replicated on the destination? Defaults to FALSE

param.name: asSuperfile
param.desc: Should the file be copied as a superfile? If TRUE and source is a superfile, then the operation creates a superfile on the target, creating sub-files as needed and only overwriting existing sub-files whose content has changed. If FALSE a single file is created. Defaults to FALSE.

param.name: compress
param.desc: Whether to compress the new file. Defaults to FALSE.

param.name: forcePush
param.desc: Should the copy process should be executed on the source nodes (push) or on the destination nodes (pull)? Default is to pull.

param.name: transferBufferSize
param.desc: Overrides the size (in bytes) of the internal buffer used to copy the file. Default is 64k.

param.name: wrap
param.desc: Should the fileparts be wrapped when copying to a smaller sized cluster? The default is FALSE.

Documentation.content: Copies a distributed file to a distributed file on remote system. Similar to fCopy, except the copy executes remotely. Since the DFU workunit executes on the remote DFU server, the user name authentication must be the same on both systems, and the user must have rights to copy files on both systems.
Documentation.firstline: Copies a distributed file to a distributed file on remote system
Documentation.return: The DFU workunit id for the job.

Signature.sign: varstring fRemotePull(varstring remoteEspFsURL, varstring sourceLogicalName, varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, integer4 timeOut=-1, integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean asSuperfile=FALSE, boolean forcePush=FALSE, integer4 transferBufferSize=0, boolean wrap=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE)
Signature.name: fRemotePull

Definition.Signature: varstring fRemotePull(varstring remoteEspFsURL, varstring sourceLogicalName, varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, integer4 timeOut=-1, integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean asSuperfile=FALSE, boolean forcePush=FALSE, integer4 transferBufferSize=0, boolean wrap=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE)

Definition.name: RemotePull

Documentation.content: Same as fRemotePull, but does not return the DFU Workunit ID.
Documentation.firstline: Same as fRemotePull, but does not return the DFU Workunit ID

Signature.sign: RemotePull(varstring remoteEspFsURL, varstring sourceLogicalName, varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, integer4 timeOut=-1, integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean asSuperfile=FALSE, boolean forcePush=FALSE, integer4 transferBufferSize=0, boolean wrap=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE)
Signature.name: RemotePull

Definition.Signature: RemotePull(varstring remoteEspFsURL, varstring sourceLogicalName, varstring destinationGroup, varstring destinationLogicalName, integer4 timeOut=-1, integer4 maxConnections=-1, boolean allowOverwrite=FALSE, boolean replicate=FALSE, boolean asSuperfile=FALSE, boolean forcePush=FALSE, integer4 transferBufferSize=0, boolean wrap=FALSE, boolean compress=FALSE)

Definition.name: fMonitorLogicalFileName

param.name: eventToFire
param.desc: The user-defined name of the event to fire when the filename appears. This value is used as the first parameter to the EVENT function.

param.name: name
param.desc: The name of the logical file to monitor. This may contain wildcard characters ( * and ?)

param.name: shotCount
param.desc: The number of times to generate the event before the monitoring job completes. A value of -1 indicates the monitoring job continues until manually aborted. The default is 1.

param.name: espServerIpPort
param.desc: The url of the ESP file copying service. Defaults to the value of ws_fs_server in the environment.

Documentation.content: Creates a file monitor job in the DFU Server. If an appropriately named file arrives in this interval it will fire the event with the name of the triggering object as the event subtype (see the EVENT function).
Documentation.firstline: Creates a file monitor job in the DFU Server
Documentation.return: The DFU workunit id for the job.

Signature.sign: varstring fMonitorLogicalFileName(varstring eventToFire, varstring name, integer4 shotCount=1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'))
Signature.name: fMonitorLogicalFileName

Definition.Signature: varstring fMonitorLogicalFileName(varstring eventToFire, varstring name, integer4 shotCount=1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'))

Definition.name: MonitorLogicalFileName

Documentation.content: Same as fMonitorLogicalFileName, but does not return the DFU Workunit ID.
Documentation.firstline: Same as fMonitorLogicalFileName, but does not return the DFU Workunit ID

Signature.sign: MonitorLogicalFileName(varstring eventToFire, varstring name, integer4 shotCount=1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'))

Definition.name: fMonitorFile

param.name: eventToFire
param.desc: The user-defined name of the event to fire when the filename appears. This value is used as the first parameter to the EVENT function.

param.name: ip
param.desc: The the IP address for the file to monitor. This may be omitted if the filename parameter contains a complete URL.

param.name: filename
param.desc: The full path of the file(s) to monitor. This may contain wildcard characters ( * and ?)

param.name: subDirs
param.desc: Whether to include files in sub-directories (when the filename contains wildcards). Defaults to FALSE.

param.name: shotCount
param.desc: The number of times to generate the event before the monitoring job completes. A value of -1 indicates the monitoring job continues until manually aborted. The default is 1.

param.name: espServerIpPort
param.desc: The url of the ESP file copying service. Defaults to the value of ws_fs_server in the environment.

Documentation.content: Creates a file monitor job in the DFU Server. If an appropriately named file arrives in this interval it will fire the event with the name of the triggering object as the event subtype (see the EVENT function).
Documentation.firstline: Creates a file monitor job in the DFU Server
Documentation.return: The DFU workunit id for the job.

Signature.sign: varstring fMonitorFile(varstring eventToFire, varstring ip, varstring filename, boolean subDirs=FALSE, integer4 shotCount=1, varstring espServerIpPort=GETENV('ws_fs_server'))

Definition.name: AddSuperFile

param.name: superName
param.desc: The logical name of the superfile.

param.desc: The name of the logical file to add.

param.name: atPos
param.desc: The position to add the sub-file, or 0 to append. Defaults to 0.

param.name: addContents
param.desc: Controls whether adding a superfile adds the superfile, or its contents. Defaults to FALSE (do not expand).

param.name: strict
param.desc: Check addContents only if subName is a superfile, and ensure superfiles exist.

param.name: del
param.desc: Indicates whether the sub-file should also be removed from the disk. Defaults to FALSE.

param.desc: Controls whether the contents of a sub-file which is a superfile should be recursively removed. Defaults to FALSE.

param.name: superName
param.desc: The logical name of the superfile.

Documentation.content: Removes all soley-owned sub-files from a superfile. If a sub-file is also contained within another superfile then it is retained.

Documentation.content: Finishes a superfile transaction. This executes all the operations since the matching StartSuperFileTransaction(). If there are any errors, then all of the operations are rolled back.
Documentation.firstline: Finishes a superfile transaction

Signature.sign: FinishSuperFileTransaction(boolean rollback=FALSE)
Signature.name: FinishSuperFileTransaction

param.name: superName
param.desc: The logical name of the superfile.

param.name: recurse
param.desc: Should the contents of child-superfiles be expanded. Default is FALSE.

Documentation.content: Returns the list of sub-files contained within a superfile.
Documentation.firstline: Returns the list of sub-files contained within a superfile
Documentation.return: A dataset containing the names of the sub-files.

Documentation.content: Returns the list of all the superfiles in the system and their component sub-files.
Documentation.firstline: Returns the list of all the superfiles in the system and their component sub-files
Documentation.return: A dataset containing pairs of superName,subName for each component file.

Signature.sign: dataset(FsLogicalSuperSubRecord) LogicalFileSuperSubList()
Signature.name: LogicalFileSuperSubList

Definition.name: fPromoteSuperFileList

param.name: superNames
param.desc: A set of the names of the superfiles to act on. Any that do not exist will be created. The contents of each superfile will be moved to the next in the list.

param.name: addHead
param.desc: A string containing a comma-delimited list of logical file names to add to the first superfile after the promotion process is complete. Defaults to ''.

param.name: delTail
param.desc: Indicates whether to physically delete the contents moved out of the last superfile. The default is FALSE.

param.name: createOnlyOne
param.desc: Specifies whether to only create a single superfile (truncate the list at the first non-existent superfile). The default is FALSE.

param.name: reverse
param.desc: Reverse the order of processing the superfiles list, effectively 'demoting' instead of 'promoting' the sub-files. The default is FALSE.

Documentation.content: Moves the sub-files from the first entry in the list of superfiles to the next in the list, repeating the process through the list of superfiles.
Documentation.firstline: Moves the sub-files from the first entry in the list of superfiles to the next in the list, repeating the process through the list of superfiles
Documentation.return: A string containing a comma separated list of the previous sub-file contents of the emptied superfile.

Signature.sign: varstring fPromoteSuperFileList(set of varstring superNames, varstring addHead='', boolean delTail=FALSE, boolean createOnlyOne=FALSE, boolean reverse=FALSE)
Signature.name: fPromoteSuperFileList

Definition.Signature: varstring fPromoteSuperFileList(set of varstring superNames, varstring addHead='', boolean delTail=FALSE, boolean createOnlyOne=FALSE, boolean reverse=FALSE)

Definition.name: PromoteSuperFileList

Documentation.content: Same as fPromoteSuperFileList, but does not return the DFU Workunit ID.
